name: LeafLight
description:
LeafLight is a bite-sized, story-based platformer that puts you in the shoes of Emby, a Phytoi who has to go on an adventure after a friend disappears. Emby's adventure takes you through a plant's worst nightmare, the darkness of the caves below the village, where only torch light can keep your leaves from wilting. Frantically hop from platform to platform as you search for the next torch before your light runs out! 

Created by Dekori

Music by purple-planet.com
